attributes.action: Save Richmond Surgery in Whitchurch Shropshire from closing in October
attributes.additional_details: Richmond House surgery is closing in October 2016. The blame for this lies not with the superb team of doctors, nurses, management and administration staff but with the CCG, regional and national NHS who have failed to support the surgery in its quest for new premises. The Doctors & their support team provide the best of care to over 4,000 patients from the town and surrounding areas. The other surgeries in the town are already stretched way beyond capacity.
attributes.background: Richmond House closing in October 2016! over 4000 patients in Whitchurch & surrounding areas are in jeopardy

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. While the Government is ultimately responsible for the NHS and accountable to Parliament, the day to day operational decisions are a matter for NHS England. You can contact NHS England using the details on the following website: https://www.england.nhs.uk/contact-us/
